snippet: Choosing the legal guardian for your child in the event of your death is the right thing to do. I still haven't done it.
abstract: Choosing the legal guardian for your child in the event of your death is the right thing to do. I still haven't done it.
lead_paragraph: Here is the commentariat's most prevailing thought on choosing your child's guardian when there's no obvious solution: blood is thicker than, well, anything else.

headline.main: Parental Quandary Considered: Choosing a Child's Guardians
